name: 理查德·普赖斯
name_full: 理查德·普赖斯 Richard Price
introduction: Richard Price was born on the 26th May 1981 He is most known for being a creature actor on BBC's Doctor Who having played many incarnations of the Cybermen, a Judoon, Sea Devil, Kerblam Postman and many more.He has also worked on many many other blockbuster films and popular TV series some of you may be familiar with including the upcoming Wonka movie, Barbie, Star Wars Andor as an imperial Officer, all 3 Fantastic Beasts films, Bohemian Rhapsody, Wonder Woman 1984, Cinderella with Camilla Cabello, Father Brown (49 episodes) to name a fewWith 25 years of Film and TV appearances under his belt. Richard has also performed in Pantomime in the U.K and also performed in the Disney Parade at Disneyland Paris.
